question: In which session of All India Muslim League, the resolution for the establishment of a separate homeland for the Muslims was passed?
explanation: The resolution for the establishment of a separate homeland for the Muslims of British India passed in the annual session of the All India Muslim League held in Lahore on 22â€“24 March 1940 is a landmark document of Pakistan's history. This resolution was presented by A. K. Fazlul Huq. This resolution helped league gain ascendency in popular Muslim perception on the hope of a separate country.
